meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Max Goldberg Susan Yarborough Jeff Slike Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1208.

td.p: Max Goldberg, a consultant originally from Wilmington, Delaware
Susan Yarborough, a ghost writer from Atlanta, Georgia
Jeff Slike, an ATM repairman originally from Harrisburg, Pennsylvania (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,100)

tr.td: AMERICAN INDIANS
SOAP OPERAS
FLOWERS
DRIVING
"POT"s
